q: In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey for a long time to come,'' Eric Schmidt said. Page praised Eric Schmidt , too. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said. '' Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him'' The change in command overshadowed Google's fourth-quarter earnings, which soared past analysts' estimates as the

coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed! Eric Schmidt , a tech industry veteran who was brought in 10 years ago to provide what some at the company called ''adult supervision'' for Google's young founders, will take on the role of executive chairman,

Labour's deputy leader Harriet Harman told Sky's Dermot Murnaghan that allegations of illegal activity must be investigated fully. Obviously the criminal law has got to be complied with and if it is broken then it should be investigated by the police and it should be enforced, she said.
